description: Numbers n such that n*6^n - 1 is prime.
mathematica: Do[ If[ PrimeQ[ n*6^n - 1 ], Print[ n ] ], {n, 1, 3500} ]
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Feb 05 2001
